targets.query:
from(bucket: "smartcity-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "smartcity_sensors" and
    r.district == "${district}" and
    r.street == "${street}" and
    r.sensor == "temperature" and
    r._field == "value"
  )

threshold =
  from(bucket: "smartcity-bucket")
    |> range(start: -30d)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r._measurement == "smartcity_config" and
      r._field == "temperature"
    )
    |> last()

start =
  threshold
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: v.timeRangeStart,
        _value: r._value
    }))

stop =
  threshold
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: v.timeRangeStop,
        _value: r._value
    }))

union(tables: [start, stop])

from(bucket: "smartcity-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>

    )
    |> last()

start =

    |> map(fn: (r) => ({

    }))

stop =
  threshold
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({

    }))

union(tables: [start, stop])

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "smartcity-bucket",
  tag: "street",
  predicate: (r) => r.district == "${district}"
)
list.name: street

query.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "smartcity-bucket",
  tag: "street",
  predicate: (r) => r.district == "${district}"
)
